title: Ross Wightman
text: David Ross Wightman (10 August 1929 – 11 January 2012) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. Primarily a <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Three-quarters">centre or wing</a>, Wightman represented , , and at a provincial level. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, on their <a href="1951%20New%20Zealand%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20Australia">1951 tour of Australia</a>, playing in four games although he did not appear in any of the three test matches.
